title: Karlie Kloss puts on a leggy display in a little black dress during night out in Madrid
text:
At the end of last month, she put her Manhattan townhouse up for sale.

And, Karlie Kloss showcased her lengthy pins in a little black dress and a classic pair of heels as she stepped out in Madrid on Thursday night.

The supermodel, 27, commanded attention as she flaunted her slender frame in the frock, which boasting a sharp plunging neckline that drew attention to her ample cleavage.

Karlie looked sensational as she sauntered through the streets of Milan in her satin mini dress.

Cinching in her waist with its cut, the catwalk queen upped the style ante with a pair of pointed black stilettos and a sparkling box clutch.

The blonde beauty ensured focus remained on her ensemble as she sported just a simple pair of silver earrings along with a few delicate rings.

Vogue coverstar Karlie complemented her radiant complexion with a heavy smokey eye, while her tresses were pulled back from her face into an effortless bun.

Meanwhile, just under a year ago, Karlie got married to 34-year-old venture capitalist Joshua Kushner.

Kloss and Kushner wed in October of 2018 after a 3-month engagement and six years of dating.

Her husband is the more private brother of senior White House adviser Jared Kushner.

Newlyweds: Karlie Kloss, 27, and Joshua Kushner, 34, wed in October of 2018 after a 3-month engagement and six years of dating (pictured here in New York on May 6)

And at the end of last month the model listed her private townhouse in Manhattan, New York for $2.75 million.

According to property records obtained by The Wall Street Journal, Kloss paid $1.975 million for the West Village crib back in 2012.

She Kushner have since upgraded, selling their Nolita apartment for $6.6 million over the summer.
